content: crochet a very cute mini giraffe with this free giraffe crochet pattern this is an easy to crochet pattern perfect for beginners including full video tutorial you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini giraffe from sport weight cotton yarn and one with bulky velvet yarn and one from chenille super bulky plush yarn link to written pattern free cute mini giraffe amigurumi crochet pattern 1 link to video free mini giraffe amigurumi video tutorial 2 this cute mini giraffe is the small version of my cute giraffe pattern you can find the bigger pattern here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cute-giraffe-amigurumi-3 1 https //www mariskavos nl/free-giraffe-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //youtu be/t1vrglu22qw
